Articles.Content:
your mission, should you choose to accept it is to install deadly re-entry and create a spacecraft to re-enter the atmosphere at as high a speed as possible and survive. Rules

1. you must have a picture of the capsule on the ground

2. you must have a picture of the end flight log showing max speed over land

3. a picture of the design

Happy launchings!
about 18,600 meters per second or 67,000 kilometers per hour or Mach 54.

some magic engines that run without fuel there bimu?

anyway, without rules about infinite fuel usage and engine parts or fuel limits this challenge will not be in any way competitive.

The parts are totally legit, I just used infinite fuel that's all.
